DOC.criteria: Subjects must part Endo 200003 Endo 200004 clinical study Subjects inform nature longterm followup study agree participation provide Informed Consent Underwent another endoscopic surgical treatment GERD ( except reintervention Gatekeeper ) Developed medical illness may cause subject noncompliant Extensive Barrett 's Esophagus ( > 2 cm ) Unable unwilling cooperate study procedure
